measured_by: k parameter of the fitted hyperbolic discounting function
justification: "…fitted a hyperbolic function to these indifference points over time intervals. From this fitted function, we retrieved the k parameter as an overall measure of discounting."

measured_by: Area Under the Curve (AUC) of LL-choice proportions
justification: "First, we calculated the proportion of LL choices for each interval and derived the areas under the curve (AUC) as summary measure of temporal discounting."
